reviews.review: 也许我玩的steam游戏比较少，但是我愿称它为steam必玩游戏。无可比拟的剧情，最后结局萌哭了。在过图的时候，总是在怀疑智商2333.前面一半在小房间里，后面一半实在外面的大地图。小房间相对，比较简单，至少能一目了然，大地图就比较难，有时候都找不到能开门的地方。我玩了是11小时通关，1-5章，都是小地图，比较方便简单，6-9是大地图。我最后三关是看着攻略来玩的，主要是为了找门哈哈。这游戏真不错。墙裂推荐，这次冬促还打折，7块，犹豫就会败北，果断就会白给。
i have literally never played a game that touched me emotionally to this extent. Awesome.

really good game play, great story and even if your'e not in it for the story the puzzles are good too. and even if you don't have the best of pc's it will run butter smooth with high quality graghics. i over all recomed to all, plus you do not need to play the first game to understand this one!

Portal 2 is even better than the original. (Original is still good btw.) Portal 2 is more story driven and obviously brings back the puzzles we loved in the last game and expands on it. It also has really good coop with it's own story. Plus don't forget all that good workshop content. Just get it.

Portal 2 is a fantastic sequal to the original portal game. i got it on sale for $0.99 but even at full price it is totally worth it. my first playthrough took me about 3 days but my second only took a couple hours showing how dry the replay value is. even so though once youve completed the singleplayer campaign theres an entire multiplayer campaign that will take you another couple days and then theres steam workshop support for making custom test chambers. so after you complete the game you can play other peoples levels or create your own. of course its not without its flaws. one of my complaints is that the test chamber creator can get a bit finnickey especially when you have a lot of objects. also chapter 6 and seven of the campaign are a bit dry. but overall totally recomend
